languages.text: "Цепной пес гонится за проблесками зари, но всполохи разрядов и запах масла сбивают его нюх. Цепь волочится за ним — что станется, если поднимешь ее? Станешь хозя{mf|ином|йкой} или новым зверем в своре подлинного владыки?"

traits.locale_text: "Цепной пес гонится за проблесками зари, но всполохи разрядов и запах масла сбивают его нюх. Цепь волочится за ним — что станется, если поднимешь ее? Станешь хозя{mf|ином|йкой} или новым зверем в своре подлинного владыки?"
traits.speaker: IdiraCompanion

languages.text: "A chained hound chases after glimmers of the aurora, but sparks and the scent of oil confound his nose. A chain trails after him — what will happen if you pick it up? Will you become his {mf|master|mistress}, or merely another beast in the pack of his true lord?"
languages.original_text: "Цепной пес гонится за проблесками зари, но всполохи разрядов и запах масла сбивают его нюх. Цепь волочится за ним — что станется, если поднимешь ее? Станешь хозя{mf|ином|йкой} или новым зверем в своре подлинного владыки?"

traits.locale_text: "A chained hound chases after glimmers of sunrise, but sparks and the scent of oil confound his nose. A chain trails after him — what will happen if you pick it up? Will you become his {mf|master|mistress}, or merely another beast in the pack of his true lord?"
traits.speaker: IdiraCompanion

traits.locale_text: "A chained hound chases after glimmers of sunrise, but sparks and the scent of oil confound his nose. A chain trails after him — what will happen if you pick it up? Will you become his {mf|master|mistress}, or merely another beast in the pack of his true lord?"
traits.speaker: IdiraCompanion

traits.locale_text: "A chained hound chases after glimmers of sunrise, but sparks and the scent of oil confound his nose. A chain trails after him — what will happen if you pick it up? Will you become his {mf|master|mistress}, or merely another beast in the pack of his true lord?"
traits.speaker: IdiraCompanion

traits.locale_text: "A chained hound chases after glimmers of the aurora, but sparks and the scent of oil confound his nose. A chain trails after him — what will happen if you pick it up? Will you become his {mf|master|mistress}, or merely another beast in the pack of his true lord?"
traits.speaker: IdiraCompanion

languages.text: “一条拴着链子的猎犬，追逐着极光散发出来的微光，但他的鼻子却被火花和汽油的味道迷惑。他身后拖着一条链子，如果你捡起了这条链子，会发生什么事情？你会成为他的{mf|主人|女主人}吗？还是仅仅成为他真正主人手下的另一头猎犬？”
languages.original_text: "A chained hound chases after glimmers of the aurora, but sparks and the scent of oil confound his nose. A chain trails after him — what will happen if you pick it up? Will you become his {mf|master|mistress}, or merely another beast in the pack of his true lord?"

traits.locale_text: “一条拴着链子的猎犬，追逐着极光散发出来的微光，但他的鼻子却被火花和汽油的味道迷惑。他身后拖着一条链子，如果你捡起了这条链子，会发生什么事情？你会成为他的{mf|主人|女主人}吗？还是仅仅成为他真正主人手下的另一头猎犬？”
traits.speaker: IdiraCompanion

languages.original_text: "A chained hound chases after glimmers of the aurora, but sparks and the scent of oil confound his nose. A chain trails after him — what will happen if you pick it up? Will you become his {mf|master|mistress}, or merely another beast in the pack of his true lord?"

languages.text: «Un sabueso encadenado persigue los destellos de la aurora, pero las chispas y el olor del combustible confunden su olfato. La cadena se arrastra a su espalda: ¿qué ocurrirá si la toma en sus manos? ¿Se convertirá en su am{mf|o|a} o será otra bestia de la manada de su auténtico señor?».
languages.original_text: "A chained hound chases after glimmers of the aurora, but sparks and the scent of oil confound his nose. A chain trails after him — what will happen if you pick it up? Will you become his {mf|master|mistress}, or merely another beast in the pack of his true lord?"

traits.locale_text: «Un sabueso encadenado persigue los destellos de la aurora, pero las chispas y el olor del combustible confunden su olfato. La cadena se arrastra a su espalda: ¿qué ocurrirá si la toma en sus manos? ¿Se convertirá en su am{mf|o|a} o será otra bestia de la manada de su auténtico señor?».
traits.speaker: IdiraCompanion

languages.text: 「鎖につながれた猟犬がオーロラの光を追いかける。けれど、火花と油の香りがその鼻を惑わす。鎖が彼の後を追いかけている。それを拾ったあなたに何が起きるかしら？あなたは彼の主になれるのでかしら？それとも彼の真の主の群れの中の単なる一匹の獣になるのかしらね？」
languages.original_text: "A chained hound chases after glimmers of the aurora, but sparks and the scent of oil confound his nose. A chain trails after him — what will happen if you pick it up? Will you become his {mf|master|mistress}, or merely another beast in the pack of his true lord?"

traits.locale_text: 「鎖につながれた猟犬がオーロラの光を追いかける。けれど、火花と油の香りがその鼻を惑わす。鎖が彼の後を追いかけている。それを拾ったあなたに何が起きるかしら？あなたは彼の主になれるのでかしら？それとも彼の真の主の群れの中の単なる一匹の獣になるのかしらね？」
traits.speaker: IdiraCompanion

languages.text: "Ein angeketteter Hund jagt Glimmern der Aurora nach, doch Funken und der Duft von Öl verwirren seine Nase. Eine Kette schleift hinter ihm her. Was wird geschehen, wenn Ihr sie aufhebt? Werdet Ihr zu {mf|seinem Herren|seiner Herrin} werden oder nur zu einem weiteren Tier im Rudel seines wahren Meisters?"
languages.original_text: "A chained hound chases after glimmers of the aurora, but sparks and the scent of oil confound his nose. A chain trails after him — what will happen if you pick it up? Will you become his {mf|master|mistress}, or merely another beast in the pack of his true lord?"

traits.locale_text: "Ein angeketteter Hund jagt Glimmern der Aurora nach, doch Funken und der Duft von Öl verwirren seine Nase. Eine Kette schleift hinter ihm her. Was wird geschehen, wenn Ihr sie aufhebt? Werdet Ihr zu {mf|seinem Herren|seiner Herrin} werden oder nur zu einem weiteren Tier im Rudel seines wahren Meisters?"
traits.speaker: IdiraCompanion

languages.text: « Un limier enchaîné pourchasse les lueurs de l'aurore, mais des étincelles et une odeur d'huile trompent son flair. Il traîne une chaîne derrière lui. Que se passera-t-il si vous la ramassez ? Deviendrez-vous {mf|son maître|sa maîtresse}, ou juste une bête de plus dans la meute de son véritable seigneur ? »
languages.original_text: "A chained hound chases after glimmers of the aurora, but sparks and the scent of oil confound his nose. A chain trails after him — what will happen if you pick it up? Will you become his {mf|master|mistress}, or merely another beast in the pack of his true lord?"

traits.locale_text: « Un limier enchaîné pourchasse les lueurs de l'aurore, mais des étincelles et une odeur d'huile trompent son flair. Il traîne une chaîne derrière lui. Que se passera-t-il si vous la ramassez ? Deviendrez-vous {mf|son maître|sa maîtresse}, ou juste une bête de plus dans la meute de son véritable seigneur ? »
traits.speaker: IdiraCompanion

languages.text: "Zincire vurulmuş bir köpek, ağaran günün ışıltısına kapılır ancak kıvılcımlar ve yağ kokusu, koku hissini şaşırtır. Peşinden bir zincir gelir. Zinciri kavrarsan ne olur? Onun sahibi mi olursun yoksa asıl efendisinin sürüsündeki yeni bir hayvana mı dönüşürsün?"
languages.original_text: "A chained hound chases after glimmers of the aurora, but sparks and the scent of oil confound his nose. A chain trails after him — what will happen if you pick it up? Will you become his {mf|master|mistress}, or merely another beast in the pack of his true lord?"

traits.locale_text: "Zincire vurulmuş bir tazı, Aurora'nın ışıltısına kapılır. Kıvılcımların ve yağın kokusu, koku hissini şaşırtır. Peşinde bir zincir onu izler. Zinciri kavrarsan ne olur? Onun efendisi mi olursun yoksa asıl lordunun sürüsündeki başka bir köpeğe mi dönüşürsün?"
traits.speaker: IdiraCompanion
